hi,

You can use the Junit task in your ANT scripts. You should be able to find more information in the ANT and Junit documentation

use <junit>...</junit>

I got hold this by googling "junit task"

regards
vasu

testcases/output not using ANT. Is there any
alternative tool to generate HTML reports for the pass
and failed cases. Thanks in advance.
